name: The Simpsons Arcade Game
description:
The Simpsons Arcade Game is an arcade game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment and Backbone Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1991. Konami published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Simpsons Arcade Game is available on PlayStation 3 and PC.
It was scored by Norio Hanzawa.
